item.description:
For those organizers who feel that these meet-ups, where we share ideas, advice and touch base, are important to hold regularly, I invite you to join us at UNO Pizzeria on Sunday 13th June at 5pm for drinks and/or dinner.

I know the location and time are not convenient for everyone, but the last meeting at Bertucci's with Biagio convinced me that these meetings are very necessary and productive, so I hope you will try to attend.

I also feel that with the ever-increasing number of meet-ups, exploring the possibility of more joint meet-ups for our groups would be great.

Hope to see you there. Marianne (A0)
item.how_to_find_us: ask the Hostess for me by name and I will have a meet-up sign at the table
item.name: ORGANIZERS' DRINKS AND DINNER MEET-UP AT COPLEY SQUARE 6/13 at 5PM
